channel.title: ADHD Clearinghouse: FAERS Pharmacovigilance Updates
channel.description: Current FDA Adverse Event Reporting System (FAERS) data for ADHD medications and comparator drugs

item.title: FAERS Update: ACETAMINOPHEN (G) - 106183 Total Reports
item.description:
Current FAERS Data for ACETAMINOPHEN (G)
  • Total Reports: 106,183
  • Deaths: 1027
  • Death Rate: 0.967%
  • Life Threatening: 1021
  • Hospitalizations: 17544
  • Active Ingredient: Acetaminophen

Data current as of 2025-10-28. FAERS reports represent suspected associations, not proven causation.

]]>
